name: NEKO ARENA
description:
NEKO ARENA

is a one of a kind epic battle which combines all of the elements of classic Arena fight with beauty & Neko Powers of our amazing fighters. Our Neko Girls are smart, quick to think & act and they are willing to fight till the last breath. So, you are warned.


Neko Island

is the most rare & beautiful piece of nature in the middle of the ocean. Neko Girls found it many centuries ago and have inhabited it even since. Neko Girls Arena is your opportunity to explore the island and enjoy it's beautiful views and adorable habitats.

What is it here to do?

  • - join the army of our beautiful Neko Girls
  • - explore the never seen before Neko Island
  • - win & gain the title of Neko Girls' Master
  • - as any Neko you'll be as fast&high as ever
